title: ICE / EGGHEAD
description: Side-dialogue. Has the Physical Instrument check that makes Andre's Composure dance check easier and initiates the TO:DO - Make Van Eyck's jam more hard core

dialogueTree.title: Egg Head: ""Good morning, comrade! Yeaaaaaah!"..."
dialogueTree.text: "Good morning, comrade! Yeaaaaaah!" He waves his hand in the air. "Harder core!" The words echo magnificently throughout the nave.

dialogueTree.title: Egg Head: ""Eat the poor! Yeaaaaaah!" He waves..."
dialogueTree.text: "Eat the poor! Yeaaaaaah!" He waves his hand in the air. "Harder core!" The words echo magnificently throughout the nave.

dialogueTree.title: Egg Head: ""Welcome to Revachol! Yeaaaaaah!" H..."
dialogueTree.text: "Welcome to Revachol! Yeaaaaaah!" He waves his hand in the air. "Harder core!" The words echo magnificently throughout the nave.

dialogueTree.title: Egg Head: ""A better deal! Yeaaaaaah!" He wave..."
dialogueTree.text: "A better deal! Yeaaaaaah!" He waves his hand in the air. "Medium core!" The words echo magnificently throughout the nave.

dialogueTree.title: Egg Head: ""Good morning! YEEAAAHHH!" He waves..."
dialogueTree.text: "Good morning! YEEAAAHHH!" He waves his hand in the air. "Harder core!" The words echo magnificently throughout the nave.

dialogueTree.title: Egg Head: ""Dolorian church, the place to be!..."
dialogueTree.text: "Dolorian church, the place to be! Make some noise, my church people!" Large speakers are set up behind the young man, blasting a familiar song.

links.title: Physical Instrument: "Vibrations thump through your blue..."
links.text: Vibrations thump through your blue soul. The music sounds much better in the church.

links.title: Shivers: "A hawthorn tree on Rue de Saint-Ghi..."
links.text: A hawthorn tree on Rue de Saint-Ghislaine. Tangled in its branches, something bronze flutters in the wind...

links.title: Egg Head: "He stands on stage behind a table,..."
links.text: He stands on stage behind a table, nodding along to the music and waving his hand in the air. In front of him -- the audio mixer, one reel spinning.

links.title: Egg Head: "The other reel deck is empty. Cable..."
links.text: The other reel deck is empty. Cables run hither and thither. On one side, you see an auxiliary line-in with the number 4.5 written next to it.

dialogueTree.title: Egg Head: "The large-headed youth has closed h..."
dialogueTree.text: The large-headed youth has closed his eyes, lost in the music. Sensing you, he opens them...

links.title: Egg Head: ""Good morning, comrade! Yeaaaaaah!""
links.text: "Good morning, comrade! Yeaaaaaah!"

links.title: You: ""Whoa, that was a crazy sound we he..."
links.text: "Whoa, that was a crazy sound we heard before."

links.title: Egg Head: ""Yeah! It was awesome, and scary. V..."
links.text: "Yeah! It was awesome, and scary. Very hard core!" His voice booms through the chamber, then gets silent.

links.title: Egg Head: ""Too hard core, in fact." He brushe..."
links.text: "Too hard core, in fact." He brushes his hand through his hair. "I couldn't control it. At all!"

links.title: You: ""What happened?""
links.text: "What happened?"

links.title: Egg Head: ""It sucks up all the air in the mix..."
links.text: "It sucks up all the air in the mix until its the only thing left! Starts compressing itself and everything around it. Completely fills up the headspace. Extreme!"

links.title: Physical Instrument: "Inside your chest, the heart beats..."
links.text: Inside your chest, the heart beats still with the after-effects of the sound. Imagine if you could harness that power... making it pulse.

links.title: You: ""What if this is the answer to van..."
links.text: "What if this is the answer to van Eyck's jam? We could use the sound for the bass..."

links.title: Egg Head: ""Ooh. Ooh!" His puzzled face turns..."
links.text: "Ooh. Ooh!" His puzzled face turns into a wicked grin. "But how?!"

links.title: Logic: "What about the compressor the one w..."
links.text: What about the compressor the one with the spiky hair was setting up... to achieve some sort of *parallel processing*...

links.title: Conceptualization: "What do we have around here to achi..."
links.text: What do we have around here to achieve some sort of... *parallel processing*...

links.title: You: ""The Horn of Apocalypse. It draweth..."
links.text: "The Horn of Apocalypse. It draweth near."

links.title: Egg Head: ""YEAAAGH! Welcome to the Gloaming!"..."
links.text: "YEAAAGH! Welcome to the Gloaming!" He grins.

links.title: You: ""Is there anything we can do about..."
links.text: "Is there anything we can do about it?"

links.title: Egg Head: ""Ooh." His mind is seemingly flippi..."
links.text: "Ooh." His mind is seemingly flipping through the options. "I don't know. Maybe *someone* can do something with this. I imagine this is the sound that the future could make."

links.title: You: ""Sounds like a horrible future.""
links.text: "Sounds like a horrible future."

links.title: Egg Head: ""Can't escape the sound, can't esca..."
links.text: "Can't escape the sound, can't escape the future!"

links.title: You: ""Sounds like the future could be ev..."
links.text: "Sounds like the future could be even more hard core than I ever imagined."

links.title: Egg Head: ""YEEEAAAGH!""
links.text: "YEEEAAAGH!"

links.title: You: ""I found this reel of tape, maybe y..."
links.text: "I found this reel of tape, maybe you can use it to hard-up Eyck's jam." (Give him the fixed hawthrone tree tape.)

links.title: Egg Head: ""Yeagh, re-mix time!" His voice boo..."
links.text: "Yeagh, re-mix time!" His voice booms through the church as he takes the tape and attaches it to the empty reel slot. "Tape goes here -- into deck B." He clicks a switch, the tape starts spinning...

links.title: Egg Head: "A hand on his ear, he listens to th..."
links.text: A hand on his ear, he listens to the audio through his headphones, and shouts...

links.title: Egg Head: ""Wow..." His face lights up with de..."
links.text: "Wow..." His face lights up with delight. "Did you get this from Arno himself?"

links.title: Empathy: "A great excitement is bubbling to t..."
links.text: A great excitement is bubbling to the surface within him. This is *big*.

links.title: You: ""What do you mean?""
links.text: "What do you mean?"

links.title: Egg Head: ""Listen, I'm just going to show it..."
links.text: "Listen, I'm just going to show it to you... Ready?"

links.title: You: ""Ready.""
links.text: "Ready."

links.title: Egg Head: ""Hear that?" He grins with glee. "S..."
links.text: "Hear that?" He grins with glee. "Sounds like the missing part of van Eyck's jam!"

links.title: Egg Head: ""The sines match perfectly!""
links.text: "The sines match perfectly!"

links.title: Acele: ""What is this?" Acele looks up from..."
links.text: "What is this?" Acele looks up from her contact mic. "It's *good*. How did you guys do that?"

links.title: You: ""Do what? I just found a random tap..."
links.text: "Do what? I just found a random tape and brought it to Egg Head. He's just incredibly good at remixing."

links.title: Andre: ""Yes, but what if van Eyck based hi..."
links.text: "Yes, but what if van Eyck based his remix on some forgotten local melody -- like a folk song? And you just found the original piece that inspired him to create this jam. That would explain why it fits so well."

links.title: Acele: ""Nah, to me it sounds like classic..."
links.text: "Nah, to me it sounds like classic van Eyck, I don't think he needs any 'inspiration' from folk songs. Maybe he lives in Martinaise and just threw away a part of his song because he thought it wasn't good enough?"

links.title: Noid: ""I think it's just happenstance. Ch..."
links.text: "I think it's just happenstance. Chaos in action. Contingencies of our limited existence. That and Egg Head's fantastic talent." He nods to his friend behind the turntables.

links.title: Interfacing: "Noid's right, Egg Head's technical..."
links.text: Noid's right, Egg Head's technical talent is the key.

links.title: Logic: "No, this is definitely part of the..."
links.text: No, this is definitely part of the same song. Something cut from it. It fits too well.

links.title: Inland Empire: "Something *mysterious* is going on..."
links.text: Something *mysterious* is going on here...

links.title: You: ""Andre's got it. Sounds like a loca..."
links.text: "Andre's got it. Sounds like a local folk song re-mixed."

links.title: You: ""Acele's right, van Eyck must live..."
links.text: "Acele's right, van Eyck must live around here. It's definitely his creation."

links.title: You: ""I agree with Noid, it's just luck..."
links.text: "I agree with Noid, it's just luck -- *and* Egg Head's incredible mixing skills."

links.title: You: ""You're right, it's uncanny how wel..."
links.text: "You're right, it's uncanny how well it all goes together. Something else must be going on here..."

links.title: Andre: ""Intriguing. The way I see it... va..."
links.text: "Intriguing. The way I see it... van Eyck based his remix on some famous original piece. Like, a folk song? Something local. Seems you found an initial part with the main melody."

links.title: Noid: ""I think it's just happenstance. Ch..."
links.text: "I think it's just happenstance. Chaos in action. Contingencies of our limited existence. That and Egg Head's fantastic talent." He nods to his friend behind the turntables.

links.title: Interfacing: "Noid's right, Egg Head's technical..."
links.text: Noid's right, Egg Head's technical talent is the key.

links.title: Logic: "No, this is definitely part of the..."
links.text: No, this is definitely part of the same song. Something cut from it. It fits too well.

links.title: Inland Empire: "Something *mysterious* is going on..."
links.text: Something *mysterious* is going on here...

links.title: You: ""Maybe Arno van Eyck lives around h..."
links.text: "Maybe Arno van Eyck lives around here and just threw a part of his song away, because he thought it was shit?"

links.title: Egg Head: ""Be how it may -- if it fits, it fi..."
links.text: "Be how it may -- if it fits, it fits!" He pumps his fist in the air. "Bring up the volume!"

links.title: Conceptualization: "This is it... this is a new era. Th..."
links.text: This is it... this is a new era. The fabric of the world has been irrevocably altered.

links.title: Inland Empire: "Who will be the innocence of hyper-..."
links.text: Who will be the innocence of hyper-hard-core anodic dance music?

links.title: Andre: ""What about the bass? Do you have a..."
links.text: "What about the bass? Do you have any ideas for that?" Andre looks back at you.

links.title: Noid: ""Yeah, I remember -- you said it ne..."
links.text: "Yeah, I remember -- you said it needs more bass!"

links.title: Physical Instrument: "I think you might know the answer....."
links.text: I think you might know the answer...

links.title: You: ""What if... we used that crazy soun..."
links.text: "What if... we used that crazy sound assault from Soona's experiment, but contained, tamed it -- made it pulse?" (Proceed with task.)

links.title: Egg Head: ""Ooh. Ooh!" Egg Head's puzzled face..."
links.text: "Ooh. Ooh!" Egg Head's puzzled face turns into a wicked grin. "But how?!"

links.title: Logic: "What about that compressor Andre wa..."
links.text: What about that compressor Andre was setting up... to achieve some sort of *parallel processing*.

links.title: Conceptualization: "What do we have around here to achi..."
links.text: What do we have around here to achieve some sort of... *parallel processing*...

links.title: You: ""Honestly, nothing springs to my mi..."
links.text: "Honestly, nothing springs to my mind right now. But I'll see if I can come up with a solution down the lane." (Proceed with task.)

links.title: Egg Head: ""You're *THE WARRIOR*! THE WARRIOR..."
links.text: "You're *THE WARRIOR*! THE WARRIOR OF DANCE MUSIC!"

links.title: Andre: ""Don't be too hard on yourself if y..."
links.text: "Don't be too hard on yourself if you don't figure it out. I think the jam's already pretty ultra."

links.title: Egg Head: ""But it could be hyper, HYPER HARD..."
links.text: "But it could be hyper, HYPER HARD CORE!"

links.title: You: ""I think it's good enough the way i..."
links.text: "I think it's good enough the way it is. Adding that melody has already been a *massive* improvement. It's pretty hard core now." (Finish task.)

links.title: Egg Head: ""HARD CORE! Not exactly the hyper t..."
links.text: "HARD CORE! Not exactly the hyper that I was hoping for, but... it's definitely ULTRA!"

links.title: Andre: ""I think you did an amazing job her..."
links.text: "I think you did an amazing job here, detective. I would have never thought that van Eyck could be improved on -- but you did it, you made it even better than before."

links.title: Noid: ""Yeah, plus it's good to know your..."
links.text: "Yeah, plus it's good to know your limits."

links.title: Egg Head: ""NO LIMITS ON THE DANCEFLOOR!""
links.text: "NO LIMITS ON THE DANCEFLOOR!"

links.title: Physical Instrument: "You can't just leave it without a b..."
links.text: You can't just leave it without a bass track!

links.title: You: ""Andre's got it. Sounds like a loca..."
links.text: "Andre's got it. Sounds like a local song re-mixed."

links.title: You: ""I agree with Noid, it's just luck..."
links.text: "I agree with Noid, it's just luck -- *and* Egg Head's incredible mixing skills."

links.title: Egg Head: ""Hear that?" He grins with glee. "S..."
links.text: "Hear that?" He grins with glee. "Sounds like the missing part of van Eyck's jam!"

links.title: Egg Head: ""Whooh, hear that?!" He wipes his b..."
links.text: "Whooh, hear that?!" He wipes his brow. "The sines match perfectly!"

links.title: Egg Head: ""Now if only we had the beat for th..."
links.text: "Now if only we had the beat for the *full assault*. It would be unbelievably hyper!"

links.title: Egg Head: ""Whooh, hear that?!" He wipes his b..."
links.text: "Whooh, hear that?!" He wipes his brow. "The sines match perfectly!"

links.title: You: ""Uh, no, actually I found it tangle..."
links.text: "Uh, no, actually I found it tangled up in a hawthorn tree..."

links.title: Egg Head: ""Yeagh, re-mix time!" His voice boo..."
links.text: "Yeagh, re-mix time!" His voice booms through the church as he takes the tape and attaches it to the empty reel slot. "Tape goes here -- into deck B." He clicks a switch, the tape starts spinning...

links.title: You: ""Hey, I have a tape with me, maybe..."
links.text: "Hey, I have a tape with me, maybe you can use it to improve van Eyck's jam."

links.title: Egg Head: ""Tape, yeah!" He grins. "Spin the t..."
links.text: "Tape, yeah!" He grins. "Spin the tape until the space escape, yeah!"

links.title: You: ""I found this over at downtown Mart..."
links.text: "I found this over at downtown Martinaise." (Give him the bundle of magnetic tape.)

links.title: Egg Head: ""But... it needs to be played, on t..."
links.text: "But... it needs to be played, on the turntable. And it's broken." Seeing this abuse of music brings a twinge of sadness to his face.

links.title: You: ""Wait, what do you mean?""
links.text: "Wait, what do you mean?"

links.title: Egg Head: ""Tape goes around spool. I spin the..."
links.text: "Tape goes around spool. I spin the world 'round, with my mic in the ground! Yeeaaaahhh!"

links.title: You: ""Alright, where can I get it repair..."
links.text: "Alright, where can I get it repaired?"

links.title: Egg Head: ""Look around! You gotta help it, he..."
links.text: "Look around! You gotta help it, help it survive. Can't leave the tune like this." He hands back the bundle of magnetic tape.

links.title: Andre: ""There's a record store in Jamrock,..."
links.text: "There's a record store in Jamrock, but that's a bit far away... Maybe some local shopkeeper or handyman can help you fix it?"

links.title: Interfacing: "Like that guy from the pawnshop, wh..."
links.text: Like that guy from the pawnshop, what was his name? The Bird's Nest Roy.

links.title: You: ""I got you this banging Megamix." (..."
links.text: "I got you this banging Megamix." (Give him the Great Doorgunner Megamix.)

links.title: Egg Head: ""Aiiight!" He snatches the tape fro..."
links.text: "Aiiight!" He snatches the tape from your hand and attaches it to the empty reel slot. One hand on his headphones, he listens to the audio. Then, shaking his head, he says:

links.title: Egg Head: ""No. No, no, this is gonna make peo..."
links.text: "No. No, no, this is gonna make people scared!" He hands the tape back to you. "Keep it positive, keep the *love* in the house!"

links.title: You: ""What about this one?" (Give him th..."
links.text: "What about this one?" (Give him the Smallest Church in Saint-Saëns.)

links.title: Egg Head: ""Righteous!" He takes the tape and..."
links.text: "Righteous!" He takes the tape and attaches it to the empty reel slot. Hand over ear, he listens, then shakes his head:

links.title: Egg Head: ""No. No, can't do, this is gonna ma..."
links.text: "No. No, can't do, this is gonna make people sad! This isn't sad-core." He hands the tape back to you.

links.title: You: ""Okay, never mind.""
links.text: "Okay, never mind."

links.title: You: ""Egg, can you please route Soona's..."
links.text: "Egg, can you please route Soona's signal through your speakers?"

links.title: Egg Head: ""To the mega! Yeagh!" He gets serio..."
links.text: "To the mega! Yeagh!" He gets serious. "I can route it through auxilliary -- what kind of a cable does she use? 3.5 or 4.5?"

links.title: You: ""It's 3.5, no doubt about it. It's..."
links.text: "It's 3.5, no doubt about it. It's on the ground." (Point to it.)

links.title: Egg Head: ""Oh... oh... she uses 3.5..." An un..."
links.text: "Oh... oh... she uses 3.5..." An uncomfortable pause follows. "Yeah, the auxiliary line-in is 4.5 mm. These two don't mix."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Oh no." The lieutenant closes his..."
links.text: "Oh no." The lieutenant closes his eyes. "We're going to be in this church *forever*."

links.title: Egg Head: ""Don't worry, I have an *adapter* f..."
links.text: "Don't worry, I have an *adapter* for it right here!" He searches for the cable on the ground and picks it up, looking at the jack.

links.title: Egg Head: ""Hang on -- this *is* a 4.5! We're..."
links.text: "Hang on -- this *is* a 4.5! We're all good, people!" With a grin he sticks the plug into the auxiliary line-in. You hear a satisfying click.

links.title: Interfacing: "Whooh, thank god -- adapters notice..."
links.text: Whooh, thank god -- adapters noticeably degrade the sound quality.

links.title: Soona, the Programmer: ""Great, someone got through to him...."
links.text: "Great, someone got through to him. Okay, let's get it all set up. Can we turn the music off, please?"

links.title: You: ""Egg, the music?""
links.text: "Egg, the music?"

links.title: Egg Head: ""Everybody, everybody! Don't panic,..."
links.text: "Everybody, everybody! Don't panic, I'm going to turn off the Arno for *just a sec*," the young man shouts as he clicks a switch on the mixer, "for a *special scheduled event*..."

links.title: Egg Head: ""The Arno will be back! But we're d..."
links.text: "The Arno will be back! But we're doing *something else* for one moment." He turns to you. "Alright, go tell her that Egg Head is ready to rave to her *tunes* -- and then I'll turn off the music!"

links.title: Inland Empire: "Oh god, you're going to be in this..."
links.text: Oh god, you're going to be in this church forever. FOREVER.

links.title: You: ""How do you like it in the church?""
links.text: "How do you like it in the church?"

links.title: Egg Head: ""Yeeaaaagh! Back on the case, no di..."
links.text: "Yeeaaaagh! Back on the case, no disgrace!" He pumps his fist in the air. "Bring it down to party place!"

links.title: Egg Head: ""THE FIRST PAGE OF THE SECOND CHAPT..."
links.text: "THE FIRST PAGE OF THE SECOND CHAPTER!" His voice echoes all around the grand hall.

links.title: Conceptualization: "Could it be? Maybe for him -- you o..."
links.text: Could it be? Maybe for him -- you only have a chapter or two left in you. Last of the penultimate, more like...

links.title: You: ""You said you were worried. What do..."
links.text: "You said you were worried. What do you think is wrong with the music?"

links.title: Egg Head: ""There's nothing wrong with it. I'm..."
links.text: "There's nothing wrong with it. I'm still in love with the hard core." He turns pensive all of a sudden.

links.title: Egg Head: ""Sometimes I just feel like anodic..."
links.text: "Sometimes I just feel like anodic music is in its infancy, you know? For example, take this Arno van Eyck jam I've been pumping for the last month... and will continue pumping for the rest of '51..."

links.title: Egg Head: ""Isn't something holding it back? F..."
links.text: "Isn't something holding it back? From being hyper?" He thinks for a moment, then his expression clears...

links.title: Egg Head: ""It's like it's only *ultra*.""
links.text: "It's like it's only *ultra*."

links.title: Andre: ""I think it's super hard core, but..."
links.text: "I think it's super hard core, but you're right, it's not *hyper* hard core."

links.title: You: ""I am The Law and an expert in thes..."
links.text: "I am The Law and an expert in these matters. Let me be the judge of what it is: hyper, super, or ultra hard core."

links.title: Egg Head: "The young man looks at you reverent..."
links.text: The young man looks at you reverently, as if observing the judgement inside your head. Growing, taking form.

links.title: Noid: "In the background, his friend drops..."
links.text: In the background, his friend drops a heavy electric drill. He, too, waits for your judgement with undivided attention.

links.title: You: ""I could settle it for you, but not..."
links.text: "I could settle it for you, but not right now. Tell me something else, Egg Head."

links.title: Conceptualization: "If anything, it sounds a bit *proto..."
links.text: If anything, it sounds a bit *proto*. Like it's not fully formed yet. You might be a moribund alcoholic and a failed cop, but you are pretty certain a thing cannot be both *proto* and *hard core*.

links.title: You: ""It's hyper hard core.""
links.text: "It's hyper hard core."

links.title: Noid: ""We can all hear it's not hyper har..."
links.text: "We can all hear it's not hyper hard core. If figures of authority keep telling us things are hyper, when they're clearly not -- how are we ever supposed to evolve to hyperdom?"

links.title: You: ""You can't. But you do.""
links.text: "You can't. But you do."

links.title: Noid: "The young man smiles and nods. Slow..."
links.text: The young man smiles and nods. Slowly he picks up two hammers at once.

links.title: Egg Head: ""THE R, THE C, THE M, THE THEOLOGY!..."
links.text: "THE R, THE C, THE M, THE THEOLOGY! AROOO!"

links.title: Encyclopedia: "RCM? That's the acronym for Revacho..."
links.text: RCM? That's the acronym for Revachol Citizens Militia -- you! Does everything this man yells mean something? Is it truly *internally coherent*?

links.title: You: ""Okay, I've changed my mind.""
links.text: "Okay, I've changed my mind."

links.title: Egg Head: ""Uhuh?" The young man raises the ta..."
links.text: "Uhuh?" The young man raises the tape player higher in anticipation.

links.title: You: ""I don't really have an answer for..."
links.text: "I don't really have an answer for this. Tell me something else, Egg Head."

links.title: You: ""It's super hard core.""
links.text: "It's super hard core."

links.title: Andre: ""Fuck yeah, I knew it!""
links.text: "Fuck yeah, I knew it!"

links.title: Inland Empire: "He *seems* sure, but you are left w..."
links.text: He *seems* sure, but you are left with the nagging doubt you might have overestimated the hard coreness of that jam...

links.title: You: ""It's only ultra hard core.""
links.text: "It's only ultra hard core."

links.title: Egg Head: ""It is, isn't it?!" He nods in agre..."
links.text: "It is, isn't it?!" He nods in agreement. "I knew it!"

links.title: Egg Head: ""But how could it *become* harder-c..."
links.text: "But how could it *become* harder-core? I know the answer in my heart, but cannot think it in my head. If this is not hyper, how could anything be..."

links.title: You: ""Sounds suspiciously like a *questi..."
links.text: "Sounds suspiciously like a *question*. I thought the question was: What is the question?"

links.title: Egg Head: ""No, this is THE ANSWER!""
links.text: "No, this is THE ANSWER!"

links.title: You: "Try to think if anything could make..."
links.text: Try to think if anything could make it... harder-core?

links.title: Egg Head: ""Whaaaat?!" He looks at you with cu..."
links.text: "Whaaaat?!" He looks at you with customary amazement. "Guys, there's something happening in his head!"

links.title: Endurance: "As your mind works, the beat recede..."
links.text: As your mind works, the beat recedes from your ears. You hear your own blood pulsing through your head, nourishing your thoughts with oxygen. The rhythm is familiar...

links.title: You: "Think even harder."
links.text: Think even harder.

links.title: Egg Head: ""Oh yeah! He's DOING it!""
links.text: "Oh yeah! He's DOING it!"

links.title: Logic: "But you're not. This is almost cert..."
links.text: But you're not. This is almost certainly a matter that surpasses the limits of reason.

links.title: You: ""My imagination fails me.""
links.text: "My imagination fails me."

links.title: Egg Head: ""I know, so does mine!" He laughs a..."
links.text: "I know, so does mine!" He laughs and shakes his head.

links.title: Electrochemistry: "But there's something else that has..."
links.text: But there's something else that hasn't failed you...

links.title: You: "Feel the movement of blood through..."
links.text: Feel the movement of blood through your head.

links.title: Endurance: "The abstract shapes swelling in the..."
links.text: The abstract shapes swelling in the foreground have done so in vain. This is a core matter. The answer, in the double-kick that moves the millilitres through your mind. The dark thud is the source of all rhythm, the inspiration behind mathematics...

links.title: Endurance: "The hard core."
links.text: The hard core.

links.title: You: ""Wait! I just remembered something!..."
links.text: "Wait! I just remembered something! I'm the police!"

links.title: Egg Head: ""Uh-uh?" The young man is bursting..."
links.text: "Uh-uh?" The young man is bursting with anticipation!

links.title: You: ""Nothing. Me being the police isn't..."
links.text: "Nothing. Me being the police isn't going to help us."

links.title: Egg Head: ""Oh...""
You: ""Actually, it's more likely to *hin..."
links.text: "Actually, it's more likely to *hinder* us."

links.title: You: ""And I have a job to do instead of..."
links.text: "And I have a job to do instead of this absurd idiocy! Goodbye." [Leave.]

links.title: You: ""I can't help you with this right n..."
links.text: "I can't help you with this right now. I need something else, something *extra*..."

links.title: Egg Head: ""Yeah...""
links.text: "Yeah..."

links.title: Egg Head: ""YEAGHH!" (He's not even the slight..."
links.text: "YEAGHH!" (He's not even the slightest bit disappointed.)

links.title: You: ""It's proto -- not hard core at all.""
links.text: "It's proto -- not hard core at all."

links.title: Egg Head: ""WHOAH! Culture Cop!""
links.text: "WHOAH! Culture Cop!"

links.title: Empathy: "For a moment you almost think he's..."
links.text: For a moment you almost think he's going to put his hand down. But that would be ludicrous.

links.title: Egg Head: ""I think you might be right! But ho..."
links.text: "I think you might be right! But how could it *become* hard core then? I know it in my heart, but cannot think it in my head. If this is not hard core, how could anything be..."

links.title: Empathy: "For a moment you almost think he's..."
links.text: For a moment you almost think he's going to put the tape player down. But that would be ludicrous.

links.title: You: ""How much is the fish?""
links.text: "How much is the fish?"

links.title: Noid: ""This is a serious matter. Stop tal..."
links.text: "This is a serious matter. Stop talking about fish. Fish has got nothing to do with this."

links.title: Perception (Hearing): ""Psst..." You can hear the would-be..."
links.text: "Psst..." You can hear the would-be leader whisper to his friend: "Don't let him know he doesn't understand the fish thing."

links.title: You: ""Are you a thought reader?""
links.text: "Are you a thought reader?"

links.title: Egg Head: ""NO NATION, BUT TRANCE NATION! NO W..."
links.text: "NO NATION, BUT TRANCE NATION! NO WAR, BUT CLASS WAR!"

links.title: You: ""Does that mean you're a thought re..."
links.text: "Does that mean you're a thought reader?"

links.title: Noid: ""Don't be a lunatic. Of course he i..."
links.text: "Don't be a lunatic. Of course he isn't. Germaine here just yells random things. Odds are, sooner or later one of them will come off as thought reading."

links.title: Logic: "So, it's not this one. It's the wor..."
links.text: So, it's not this one. It's the world that's the thought reader in this equation?

links.title: Egg Head: ""Yeah! REVACHOL IMPERATIVE!""
links.text: "Yeah! REVACHOL IMPERATIVE!"

links.title: Noid: ""Unless you were thinking 'REVACHOL..."
links.text: "Unless you were thinking 'REVACHOL IMPERATIVE' right now... Anyway, I've had a similar thing happen with Egg's yelling, I know what you mean."

links.title: You: "(Lie.) "But I *was* thinking 'Revac..."
links.text: (Lie.) "But I *was* thinking 'Revachol imperative'!"

links.title: Noid: ""That's fucked up, man. Lying like..."
links.text: "That's fucked up, man. Lying like that. And a cop too..."

links.title: You: ""You're right, I wasn't thinking th..."
links.text: "You're right, I wasn't thinking that."

links.title: Egg Head: ""Hard Core Superstar!""
links.text: "Hard Core Superstar!"

links.title: You: ""So it's the world that's the thoug..."
links.text: "So it's the world that's the thought reader?"

links.title: Noid: "The young man picks up a level and..."
links.text: The young man picks up a level and inspects it against the floodlight. The water sparkles in the small measuring tube. "Yes," he says after a while. "I think it's correct to say that."

links.title: Shivers: "THE WORLD IS A COLD SINK."
links.text: THE WORLD IS A COLD SINK.

links.title: Shivers: "YOU ARE IN ITS ARMS."
links.text: YOU ARE IN ITS ARMS.

links.title: You: ""So you're not a thought reader, yo..."
links.text: "So you're not a thought reader, you're a communist?"

links.title: Noid: ""He's not a communist. That's just..."
links.text: "He's not a communist. That's just something he likes to yell. He picked it up from a tape-jockey at The Paliseum... *she* was a communist though."

links.title: Egg Head: ""YEAH! WITH A REBEL YELL!""
links.text: "YEAH! WITH A REBEL YELL!"

links.title: You: ""But why aren't you a communist? Co..."
links.text: "But why aren't you a communist? Communism is the truth."

links.title: Egg Head: ""I can be a communist!" He nods. "I..."
links.text: "I can be a communist!" He nods. "If you want that -- do you want me to be a communist?!"

links.title: Noid: ""Please don't turn him into a commu..."
links.text: "Please don't turn him into a communist."

links.title: Andre: ""Oh yeah, turn him into a communist..."
links.text: "Oh yeah, turn him into a communist, c'mon! It would be super!"

links.title: You: ""Be a communist, Egg Head. The futu..."
links.text: "Be a communist, Egg Head. The future needs your help."

links.title: Egg Head: ""AIIIIIGH!!!" he yells. You guess h..."
links.text: "AIIIIIGH!!!" he yells. You guess he is a communist now.

links.title: You: ""Don't be a communist... wait, what..."
links.text: "Don't be a communist... wait, what am I saying? Of course be a communist!"

links.title: You: ""Don't be a communist. That path is..."
links.text: "Don't be a communist. That path is *too* hard core."

links.title: Egg Head: ""AIIIIIGH!!!" he yells. You guess h..."
links.text: "AIIIIIGH!!!" he yells. You guess he won't become a communist after all.

links.title: You: ""It's good you're not a communist a..."
links.text: "It's good you're not a communist anyway. You should be an ultraliberal."

links.title: Egg Head: ""I can be an ultra!" He nods. "If y..."
links.text: "I can be an ultra!" He nods. "If you want that -- do you want me to be an ultra?!"

links.title: Noid: ""Please don't turn him into an ultr..."
links.text: "Please don't turn him into an ultraliberal."

links.title: Andre: ""Oh geez, please don't do that. The..."
links.text: "Oh geez, please don't do that. There's enough exploitation in the world."

links.title: You: ""Be an ultraliberal, Egg Head. Capi..."
links.text: "Be an ultraliberal, Egg Head. Capital needs your help."

links.title: Egg Head: ""AIIIIIGH!!!" he yells. You guess E..."
links.text: "AIIIIIGH!!!" he yells. You guess Egg Head is an ultraliberal now.

links.title: You: ""Don't be an ultra... wait, what am..."
links.text: "Don't be an ultra... wait, what am I saying? Of course be an ultraliberal!"

links.title: You: ""Don't be an ultraliberal. That pat..."
links.text: "Don't be an ultraliberal. That path is *too* hard core."

links.title: Egg Head: ""AIIIIIGH!!!" he yells. You guess E..."
links.text: "AIIIIIGH!!!" he yells. You guess Egg Head won't become an ultraliberal after all.

links.title: You: ""Communists are pansies. Can't figh..."
links.text: "Communists are pansies. Can't fight invaders with internationalist babble. You need the strength of a pure nation."

links.title: Egg Head: ""I can do that!" He nods. "If you w..."
links.text: "I can do that!" He nods. "If you want that -- I can be a conduit for the mystical nationhood!"

links.title: Noid: ""Please don't turn him into a fasci..."
links.text: "Please don't turn him into a fascist."

links.title: Andre: ""Oh yeah, sure, this is *exactly* w..."
links.text: "Oh yeah, sure, this is *exactly* what we need."

links.title: You: ""Be a fascist, Egg Head. Our future..."
links.text: "Be a fascist, Egg Head. Our future needs your help."

links.title: Egg Head: ""AIIIIIGH!!!" he yells. You guess E..."
links.text: "AIIIIIGH!!!" he yells. You guess Egg Head is a fascist now.

links.title: You: ""Don't be a fascist... wait, what a..."
links.text: "Don't be a fascist... wait, what am I saying? Of course be a fascist!"

links.title: You: ""Don't be a fascist. That path is *..."
links.text: "Don't be a fascist. That path is *too* hard core."

links.title: Egg Head: ""AIIIIIGH!!!" he yells. You guess E..."
links.text: "AIIIIIGH!!!" he yells. You guess Egg Head won't become a fascist after all.

links.title: You: ""Best not to be a communist. Having..."
links.text: "Best not to be a communist. Having extreme views on issues is detrimental to understanding all sides."

links.title: Egg Head: ""Oh sure, I can do that!" He nods...."
links.text: "Oh sure, I can do that!" He nods. "If you want that -- I can avoid taking a stand!"

links.title: Noid: ""Please don't turn him into a moral..."
links.text: "Please don't turn him into a moralist."

links.title: Andre: ""I don't... even know what to say t..."
links.text: "I don't... even know what to say to that."

links.title: You: ""Be a moralist, Egg Head. The balan..."
links.text: "Be a moralist, Egg Head. The balance needs your help."

links.title: Egg Head: ""AIIIIIGH!!!" he yells. You guess E..."
links.text: "AIIIIIGH!!!" he yells. You guess Egg Head is a moralist now.

links.title: You: ""Don't be a moralist... wait, what..."
links.text: "Don't be a moralist... wait, what am I saying? You should consider your choice carefully and rationally."

links.title: You: ""Don't be a moralist. That path req..."
links.text: "Don't be a moralist. That path requires a sensible examination of all nuances unattainable to most people."

links.title: Egg Head: ""AIIIIIGH!!!" he yells. You guess E..."
links.text: "AIIIIIGH!!!" he yells. You guess Egg Head won't become a moralist after all.

links.title: You: ""Tell me something else, Egg Head...""
links.text: "Tell me something else, Egg Head..."

links.title: Egg Head: ""Yeaaargh!""
links.text: "Yeaaargh!"

links.title: You: ""Right on, comrade luminary!""
links.text: "Right on, comrade luminary!"

links.title: Egg Head: ""HERE COMES THE SUN!""
links.text: "HERE COMES THE SUN!"

links.title: Electrochemistry: "You could swear you feel the bright..."
links.text: You could swear you feel the bright future of the working classes reflected off Germaine Egg Head's giant smile and right onto your face! Revolution makes your toes curl in anticipation.

links.title: You: ""Almost there. Could use just a bit..."
links.text: "Almost there. Could use just a bit more work..."

links.title: Egg Head: ""The worker must MOVE YOUR ASS!""
links.text: "The worker must MOVE YOUR ASS!"

links.title: You: ""Superb!""
links.text: "Superb!"

links.title: You: ""No, that's still not it.""
links.text: "No, that's still not it."

links.title: You: ""You're wrong. Communism doesn't ru..."
links.text: "You're wrong. Communism doesn't rule the nation."

links.title: Egg Head: ""I'm sorry.""
links.text: "I'm sorry."

links.title: Empathy: "The young man drops his oversized h..."
links.text: The young man drops his oversized head in shame. He is truly sorry he couldn't come up with a proletarian yell that would satisfy The Great Leader.

links.title: You: ""Right on, Lord Raubritter!""
links.text: "Right on, Lord Raubritter!"

links.title: Egg Head: ""EAT THE POOR!""
links.text: "EAT THE POOR!"

links.title: Savoir Faire: "You swear you feel the profit margi..."
links.text: You swear you feel the profit margins reflecting off Germaine Egg Head's giant smile.

links.title: You: ""Almost there. Could use just a bit..."
links.text: "Almost there. Could use just a bit more consolidation, a tad less regulation..."

links.title: Egg Head: ""THE MARKET REGULATES ITSELF!""
links.text: "THE MARKET REGULATES ITSELF!"

links.title: You: ""Superb!""
links.text: "Superb!"

links.title: You: ""No, that's still not it.""
links.text: "No, that's still not it."

links.title: You: ""You're wrong. Capital doesn't rule..."
links.text: "You're wrong. Capital doesn't rule the nation."

links.title: Egg Head: ""I'm sorry.""
links.text: "I'm sorry."

links.title: Rhetoric: "The young man drops his oversized h..."
links.text: The young man drops his oversized head in shame. He is truly sorry he couldn't come up with a profitable market strategy.

links.title: You: ""Welcome to Revachol!""
links.text: "Welcome to Revachol!"

links.title: Egg Head: ""WELCOME TO REVACHOL! WELCOME TO RE..."
links.text: "WELCOME TO REVACHOL! WELCOME TO REVACHOL! MYSTICAL NATIONHOOD!"

links.title: Half Light: "The bright future of Revachol refle..."
links.text: The bright future of Revachol reflects off Germaine Egg Head's giant smile. A world of Revacholian domination, where its shores are bereft of ill influence.

links.title: You: ""Almost there. Could use just a bit..."
links.text: "Almost there. Could use just a bit more heart..."

links.title: Egg Head: ""WELCOME TO REVACHOL!""
links.text: "WELCOME TO REVACHOL!"

links.title: You: ""Welcome to Revachol!""
links.text: "Welcome to Revachol!"

links.title: You: ""No, that's still not it.""
links.text: "No, that's still not it."

links.title: You: ""You're wrong. The nation can't ben..."
links.text: "You're wrong. The nation can't bend all to its will."

links.title: Egg Head: ""I'm sorry.""
links.text: "I'm sorry."

links.title: Composure: "The young man drops his oversized h..."
links.text: The young man drops his oversized head in shame. He is truly sorry he couldn't come up with a heart-felt yell that would satisfy The Great Leader.

links.title: You: ""Obviously. One shouldn't get too h..."
links.text: "Obviously. One shouldn't get too hasty with their decision-making."

links.title: Egg Head: ""I'm swiftly moving toward a soluti..."
links.text: "I'm swiftly moving toward a solution which pleases nobody!"

links.title: Volition: "You feel Germaine Egg Head's smile..."
links.text: You feel Germaine Egg Head's smile is too enthusiastic, but it'll have to do, for now.

links.title: You: ""Almost there. Could use just a bit..."
links.text: "Almost there. Could use just a bit more... something..."

links.title: Egg Head: ""INCREMENTAL CHANGE!""
links.text: "INCREMENTAL CHANGE!"

links.title: You: ""Appropriate.""
links.text: "Appropriate."

links.title: You: ""Is your real name *Germaine*?""
links.text: "Is your real name *Germaine*?"

links.title: Egg Head: ""D'accord hard core! Germaine Egg-H..."
links.text: "D'accord hard core! Germaine Egg-Head."

links.title: Andre: ""Uhm, basically, yes it is.""
links.text: "Uhm, basically, yes it is."

links.title: You: ""Why are there lungs on your belt b..."
links.text: "Why are there lungs on your belt buckle?"

links.title: Egg Head: ""Lungs are for love!""
links.text: "Lungs are for love!"

links.title: You: ""L'amour, la compassion, l'autodisc..."
links.text: "L'amour, la compassion, l'autodiscipline."

links.title: Egg Head: ""LOVE!" he suddenly yells and the w..."
links.text: "LOVE!" he suddenly yells and the world seems to stop. "In a woman's lungs! Lonely as I am, I'm not afraid! This strange, damaged feeling grows on and on, 'cause I've never loved someone like you before!"

links.title: Electrochemistry: "A dopamine surge accompanies the wo..."
links.text: A dopamine surge accompanies the words. It feels like electricity flowing down your scalp, dissipating into your neck. Feels good, like a spark of life in that moribund sponge you call your body.

links.title: You: ""Why would lungs be for love?""
links.text: "Why would lungs be for love?"

links.title: Egg Head: ""When Dolores Dei was anointed inno..."
links.text: "When Dolores Dei was anointed innocence, her lungs started glowing through her body, for the world loved her and she loved it back! YEAGH!"

links.title: Conceptualization: "Why wouldn't they be? Are the lungs..."
links.text: Why wouldn't they be? Are the lungs not the place where you hold the breath of your soul?

links.title: You: ""Really?""
links.text: "Really?"

links.title: Egg Head: ""I think so.""
links.text: "I think so."

links.title: You: ""That doesn't sound like a thing th..."
links.text: "That doesn't sound like a thing that would happen."

links.title: Noid: ""But that's what everybody saw. Exp..."
links.text: "But that's what everybody saw. Explain it as you please, but it doesn't really do to just deny it ever happened."

links.title: You: ""Thank you for the story.""
links.text: "Thank you for the story."

links.title: Egg Head: ""Rhymes that keep their secrets wil..."
links.text: "Rhymes that keep their secrets will unfold behind the clouds!"

links.title: You: ""Well. The lungs are where you hold..."
links.text: "Well. The lungs are where you hold the breath of your soul, aren't they?"

links.title: Egg Head: ""Heiligeili!""
links.text: "Heiligeili!"

links.title: You: ""Oh yeah. That makes perfect sense.""
links.text: "Oh yeah. That makes perfect sense."

links.title: You: ""Bourgeois love from a bourgeois go..."
links.text: "Bourgeois love from a bourgeois god-queen towards a world getting rapidly more bourgeois, that's lungs for you."

links.title: Noid: ""Objectively, it was good for its t..."
links.text: "Objectively, it was good for its time. And they sort of screwed it up after she passed, like they always do."

links.title: Noid: ""Don't listen to that retrograde cl..."
links.text: "Don't listen to that retrograde class warrior, Egg."

links.title: You: ""Good to know.""
links.text: "Good to know."

links.title: Egg Head: ""Yeagh!""
links.text: "Yeagh!"

links.title: You: "Maybe your body can tell you what A..."
links.text: Maybe your body can tell you what Arno van Eyck's jam is missing? To make it... harder core.

links.title: Physical Instrument: "You know it in your lungs where the..."
links.text: You know it in your lungs where the pressure should vibrate, in your heart that's alone, and in your solar plexus where the hits should land... so does every chordate animal...

links.title: You: ""Needs more bass.""
links.text: "Needs more bass."

links.title: Egg Head: ""What?!" The young man makes a sudd..."
links.text: "What?!" The young man makes a sudden move, like he's about to turn the volume down. But that would be ridiculous.

links.title: You: ""And a melody. A good melody is wha..."
links.text: "And a melody. A good melody is what makes the song really *stick*, so that you can't get it out of your head anymore." (Point at your head.)

links.title: Egg Head: ""Wow, okay! We should start with th..."
links.text: "Wow, okay! We should start with the melody. But where would we get that stuff from?"

links.title: You: ""I don't know. I was thinking *you*..."
links.text: "I don't know. I was thinking *you* would know..."

links.title: Egg Head: ""I'm sorry, I don't know anything a..."
links.text: "I'm sorry, I don't know anything about anodic music, I'm just the party boy. I get the people going and say it's hard core..."

links.title: Empathy: "He feels ashamed he can't be of mor..."
links.text: He feels ashamed he can't be of more service to the future of dance music.

links.title: You: ""Okay, I'll look into it. In an off..."
links.text: "Okay, I'll look into it. In an official capacity. It's up to the police to make the beats go harder." (Take the task.)

links.title: Egg Head: "The young man falls silent with app..."
links.text: The young man falls silent with appreciation. He even tries to contain his smile, as if it could hinder your investigation.

links.title: Andre: ""Basically what you need to find he..."
links.text: "Basically what you need to find here is a tape with some banging music on it, so that Egg Head could use it to remix van Eyck's jam."

links.title: Noid: ""Yeah. Maybe that streethawker acro..."
links.text: "Yeah. Maybe that streethawker across the pawnshop has got some tapes to sell? That's just an idea."

links.title: Endurance: "Wait, they want you to run all the..."
links.text: Wait, they want you to run all the way back to Martinaise with that leg of yours, just to get some 'tape'? Ouch.

links.title: Shivers: "There is a hawthorn tree on Rue de..."
links.text: There is a hawthorn tree on Rue de Saint-Ghislaine, right next to the canal. A reel of magnetic tape is caught in its branches, like bronze ribbons blowing in the wind...

links.title: You: ""It feels cold.""
links.text: "It feels cold."

links.title: Egg Head: ""Does it?" He looks around, looking..."
links.text: "Does it?" He looks around, looking for the cold.

links.title: Logic: "It's your health -- you're not well..."
links.text: It's your health -- you're not well enough to run around just days after you've been shot.

links.title: You: ""Before I go on, where is Rue de Sa..."
links.text: "Before I go on, where is Rue de Saint-Ghislaine?"

links.title: Egg Head: ""Oh, I know! I know this! I can tel..."
links.text: "Oh, I know! I know this! I can tell you where it is!"

links.title: Andre: ""Saint-G is the boulevard before th..."
links.text: "Saint-G is the boulevard before the canal bridge. The one that takes you to the Whirling-in-Rags and the Industrial Harbour. It's got the lanterns and the---"

links.title: Egg Head: ""I knew that! I could have said tha..."
links.text: "I knew that! I could have said that!"

links.title: Andre: ""And the mosaic sidewalk.""
links.text: "And the mosaic sidewalk."

links.title: Noid: ""But it's all blocked with that stu..."
links.text: "But it's all blocked with that stupid traffic jam right now! Anyway..."

links.title: You: "Shake it off."
links.text: Shake it off.

links.title: Andre: ""Anyway... That's all yours to figu..."
links.text: "Anyway... That's all yours to figure out, cop-man."

links.title: Egg Head: ""COP-MAN!" yells Egg Head."
links.text: "COP-MAN!" yells Egg Head.

links.title: You: ""Alright, I'll see if I come up wit..."
links.text: "Alright, I'll see if I come up with something on my own. A citizen investigation." (Take the task.)

links.title: You: ""No, I really don't have time for t..."
links.text: "No, I really don't have time for this." (Don't take the task.)

links.title: Egg Head: ""Oh..." For a moment he doesn't kno..."
links.text: "Oh..." For a moment he doesn't know what to say.

links.title: Egg Head: ""Okay, I get it, man. The party goe..."
links.text: "Okay, I get it, man. The party goes on!"

links.title: You: ""Nowhere. I'm not gonna become some..."
links.text: "Nowhere. I'm not gonna become some sort of Anodic Cop too, I've got enough copotypes already."

links.title: Reaction Speed: "Chill, my man. You'll get there --..."
links.text: Chill, my man. You'll get there -- eventually.

links.title: Egg Head: ""Oh no, please become one..." (He d..."
links.text: "Oh no, please become one..." (He didn't even notice you mentioning some 'island'.) "You'll miss out on so much good content otherwise. It's like being the greatest cop on earth!"

links.title: Egg Head: ""Oh no, please become one... you'll..."
links.text: "Oh no, please become one... you'll miss out on so much good content otherwise. It's like being the greatest cop on earth!"

links.title: Egg Head: ""Please. Please?" The young man smi..."
links.text: "Please. Please?" The young man smiles at you widely, bright and innocent as the summer sun.

links.title: Volition: "You don't have time for this nonsen..."
links.text: You don't have time for this nonsense. You've got safe boring things to do.

links.title: Volition: "His pleaful smile is disarming, but..."
links.text: His pleaful smile is disarming, but you can withstand it's glorious assault, if you just put your heart into it.

links.title: Physical Instrument: "No, that would be silly. Your body..."
links.text: No, that would be silly. Your body isn't for thinking. It's for robust, wholesome things. Things like discus, javelin, and 400 metre hurdles. Mmm... discus.

links.title: Horrific Necktie: "Did someone say *disco*?"
links.text: Did someone say *disco*?

links.title: You: "The audio onslaught can be tamed. C..."
links.text: The audio onslaught can be tamed. Connect the dots.

links.title: Interfacing: "SIDE-CHAIN THE BEAT!"
links.text: SIDE-CHAIN THE BEAT!

links.title: You: "*Side-chain*? What does it even mea..."
links.text: *Side-chain*? What does it even mean?

links.title: Interfacing: "Listen, you can use the compressor..."
links.text: Listen, you can use the compressor to select between which track it's compressing, either the auxiliary signal or the main input from the tape. Make it alternate between the signals.

links.title: Interfacing: "The compressor controls the gain ba..."
links.text: The compressor controls the gain based on the level of the signal on the aux side-chain input. It will allow maintaining a loud sound without peaks that fill up all the headspace.

links.title: You: ""Okay. Egg, you need to start side-..."
links.text: "Okay. Egg, you need to start side-chaining it." (Explain the concept to him.)

links.title: Egg Head: ""Side-chaining it, you said?" He tu..."
links.text: "Side-chaining it, you said?" He turns down the music, his hands moving deftly across the mixer, setting up the necessary controls...

links.title: Egg Head: "Then he puts on his headphones and..."
links.text: Then he puts on his headphones and his eyes go wide, wider than they've ever gone on drugs. He starts jumping up and down with bliss, in total silence -- still listening to his headphones.

links.title: Acele: ""Hey..." Acele looks up from her mi..."
links.text: "Hey..." Acele looks up from her microphone. "What did you do to Egg Head, cop-man? Did you *break* him?"

links.title: You: ""I'm... not sure.""
links.text: "I'm... not sure."

links.title: Egg Head: ""ARE YOU READY, POSSE?!""
links.text: "ARE YOU READY, POSSE?!"

links.title: Noid: "Noid straightens his back, ready fo..."
links.text: Noid straightens his back, ready for the beat...

links.title: Andre: ""I was born ready, Egg!""
links.text: "I was born ready, Egg!"

links.title: You: "Give him a thumbs up."
links.text: Give him a thumbs up.

links.title: Egg Head: "The audio assault is glorious. The..."
links.text: The audio assault is glorious. The speedfreak dances on the stage, intensely waving his hand in the air.

links.title: Egg Head: ""THIS IS BEAUTY, THIS IS LIFE!""
links.text: "THIS IS BEAUTY, THIS IS LIFE!"

links.title: Acele: ""What in the world is going on?" Ac..."
links.text: "What in the world is going on?" Acele looks on, amazed at the display.

links.title: Pain Threshold: "Your body is taking a beating from..."
links.text: Your body is taking a beating from the low frequencies crashing over you. It's making you feel... alive again.

links.title: You: ""THIS ONE IS FOR THE ANODIC GENERAT..."
links.text: "THIS ONE IS FOR THE ANODIC GENERATION!"

links.title: Egg Head: ""INTRODUCING THE ULTIMATE SOUND!""
links.text: "INTRODUCING THE ULTIMATE SOUND!"

links.title: You: ""We have... tamed the sound. Made i..."
links.text: "We have... tamed the sound. Made it our own."

links.title: Andre: ""God damn it," you hear Andre say t..."
links.text: "God damn it," you hear Andre say to himself over the thumping beat, "this dance club idea might just work out."

links.title: Egg Head: ""DOLORIAN CHURCH -- THE PLACE TO BE..."
links.text: "DOLORIAN CHURCH -- THE PLACE TO BE!" Egg's losing himself in the sound. "Pump it, pump it!"

links.title: Conceptualization: "This is it... this is a new era. Th..."
links.text: This is it... this is a new era. The fabric of the world has been irrevocably altered.

links.title: Inland Empire: "Who will be the innocence of hard-c..."
links.text: Who will be the innocence of hard-core anodic dance music?

links.title: You: ""The hard core aesthetic just got m..."
links.text: "The hard core aesthetic just got more bassy."

links.title: Noid: ""This is wild, the sines are off th..."
links.text: "This is wild, the sines are off the charts."

links.title: Egg Head: ""Whooh, thump-thump-thump, maestro!..."
links.text: "Whooh, thump-thump-thump, maestro!" The speedfreak waves his hand in the air.

links.title: Egg Head: ""Now... if only we had the melody f..."
links.text: "Now... if only we had the melody for the *full effect*!"

links.title: You: ""Just wait and see." (Nod at Egg He..."
links.text: "Just wait and see." (Nod at Egg Head.)

links.title: Interfacing: "Here's an idea -- say what you said..."
links.text: Here's an idea -- say what you said before. The exact same thing! OR. Or, wait! Say something that's only marginally different! It will yield a drastically different outcome.

links.title: You: ""You should crank up the, uh, oscil..."
links.text: "You should crank up the, uh, oscillator matrix."

links.title: Egg Head: ""Oscillator matrix?" The man's brow..."
links.text: "Oscillator matrix?" The man's brow furrows with concern. "Where is that?"

links.title: You: ""Oh, you don't *have* one? Maybe it..."
links.text: "Oh, you don't *have* one? Maybe it's just top-secret cop-tech."

links.title: Egg Head: ""TOP-SECRET COP TECH! MEGA COOL!""
links.text: "TOP-SECRET COP TECH! MEGA COOL!"

links.title: Egg Head: ""You gotta bring us some, Big Sheri..."
links.text: "You gotta bring us some, Big Sheriff! The future of hard sine depends on it!"

links.title: Noid: ""Don't listen to him," the man yell..."
links.text: "Don't listen to him," the man yells over the music. "He's making shit up. There's no top-secret cop audio tech -- there's other top-secret-spying-on-people tech most likely, but cops don't care about *music*."

links.title: You: ""It's nowhere. I just made it up.""
links.text: "It's nowhere. I just made it up."

links.title: Egg Head: "The large-headed youth gives you a..."
links.text: The large-headed youth gives you a sorely disappointed look...

links.title: Empathy: "An innocent soul, unaccustomed to a..."
links.text: An innocent soul, unaccustomed to acts of wanton guile.

links.title: Interfacing: "A cruel joke to play on an earnest..."
links.text: A cruel joke to play on an earnest torque dork.

links.title: You: ""Here, let a pro show you how it's..."
links.text: "Here, let a pro show you how it's done." (Turn some knobs at random.)

links.title: Egg Head: "As you fiddle with the knobs on the..."
links.text: As you fiddle with the knobs on the mixer, the young man stares with amazement...

links.title: Egg Head: ""Cop-man can ride the knobs! SO COO..."
links.text: "Cop-man can ride the knobs! SO COOL." He gives you a thumbs up.

links.title: Interfacing: "Whatever it is you did, it seems to..."
links.text: Whatever it is you did, it seems to have helped slightly. Maybe now you'll be able to make sense of it?

links.title: You: ""Dude, you gotta reroute the sound..."
links.text: "Dude, you gotta reroute the sound juice through the fluxifier!"

links.title: Egg Head: ""The fluxifier?" The man's brow fur..."
links.text: "The fluxifier?" The man's brow furrows with concern. "Where is that?"

links.title: You: ""I don't know the technical term, b..."
links.text: "I don't know the technical term, but it needs less *bzoot-bzoot*."

links.title: Egg Head: ""YEEEEAAARRGGHH. PUMP OFF THE *BZOO..."
links.text: "YEEEEAAARRGGHH. PUMP OFF THE *BZOOT-BZOOT*."

links.title: Interfacing: "It's hard to say for sure, but the..."
links.text: It's hard to say for sure, but the digital throbbing seems ever so slightly louder than before.

links.title: Interfacing: "*Bzoot-bzoot-bzoot* goes the track..."
links.text: *Bzoot-bzoot-bzoot* goes the track in the background, never-ending. You can't grasp what's missing. But you can try to make something up anyway.

links.title: You: "Just make it up. No way this speedf..."
links.text: Just make it up. No way this speedfreak can tell the difference.

links.title: Interfacing: "You scrape the mouldy recesses of y..."
links.text: You scrape the mouldy recesses of your brain for some technological sounding jargon. It'll impress the large-headed speedfreak.

links.title: Conceptualization: "Isn't that what *real* artists do?..."
links.text: Isn't that what *real* artists do? Make it up as they go along?

links.title: You: "Whereof one cannot speak, one ought..."
links.text: Whereof one cannot speak, one ought to remain silent.

links.title: Egg Head: "The young man bobs his head to the..."
links.text: The young man bobs his head to the music, much as before.

links.title: You: ""I've thought about the discarded m..."
links.text: "I've thought about the discarded melody and came to the conclusion that van Eyck has lived around here."

links.title: Egg Head: ""J'adore!" He turns a knob on his m..."
links.text: "J'adore!" He turns a knob on his mixer. "God is close by, but maybe he doesn't have good enough ears. Let me turn it up, so we can lure him here."

links.title: You: ""Alright. Goodbye, Egg Head." [Leav..."
links.text: "Alright. Goodbye, Egg Head." [Leave.]

links.title: Egg Head: ""Alright! HERE COMES THE NIGHT!""
links.text: "Alright! HERE COMES THE NIGHT!"

links.title: Egg Head: ""Good morning, tycoon! Yeaaaaaah!""
links.text: "Good morning, tycoon! Yeaaaaaah!"

links.title: Egg Head: ""Welcome to Revachol! Yeaaaaaah!""
links.text: "Welcome to Revachol! Yeaaaaaah!"

links.title: Egg Head: ""Incremental progress! Yeaaaaaah!""
links.text: "Incremental progress! Yeaaaaaah!"

links.title: Egg Head: ""Good morning! Yeaaaaaah! Pump it u..."
links.text: "Good morning! Yeaaaaaah! Pump it up, pump it up, pump it up!"

dialogueTree.title: Egg Head: ""We're close!" says the young man w..."
dialogueTree.text: "We're close!" says the young man with the tape player and the large boiadeiro boots. Lung-shaped trees sprout on his silver belt buckle.

links.title: Egg Head: ""True, hard, full core!""
links.text: "True, hard, full core!"

links.title: You: "Say nothing."
links.text: Say nothing.

links.title: Egg Head: ""HARD CORE!""
links.text: "HARD CORE!"

links.title: You: "Still say nothing."
links.text: Still say nothing.

links.title: Egg Head: ""HARD CORE TO THE MEGA!""
links.text: "HARD CORE TO THE MEGA!"

links.title: You: "Say nothing."
links.text: Say nothing.

links.title: Egg Head: ""INTERNALLY COHERENT!""
links.text: "INTERNALLY COHERENT!"

links.title: You: "Still say nothing."
links.text: Still say nothing.

links.title: Egg Head: ""ALL CORE! ALL RIGHT! YEAH!""
links.text: "ALL CORE! ALL RIGHT! YEAH!"

links.title: You: "Say nothing."
links.text: Say nothing.

links.title: Egg Head: "He furrows his brow as his very lar..."
links.text: He furrows his brow as his very large head traces the sublime invisible movement of the music in the very real air of the stuffy tent...

links.title: Egg Head: ""HAAAAAAARD COOORE!!! AAAAAAAIGHH!!..."
links.text: "HAAAAAAARD COOORE!!! AAAAAAAIGHH!!!" He lets out an agonized roar over the feeble-ish, obviously not too hard core beat below.

links.title: You: ""SO HARD CORE!""
links.text: "SO HARD CORE!"

links.title: Egg Head: ""Is it, though?" He stops dead in h..."
links.text: "Is it, though?" He stops dead in his tracks, tilting his head to the side.

links.title: You: ""IT IS!""
links.text: "IT IS!"

links.title: Egg Head: ""But is it? I mean, really?" He til..."
links.text: "But is it? I mean, really?" He tilts his head to the other side, like an owl.

links.title: You: ""THE QUESTION IS, WHAT IS THE QUEST..."
links.text: "THE QUESTION IS, WHAT IS THE QUESTION?!"

links.title: Egg Head: ""No, but seriously... I'm a bit wor..."
links.text: "No, but seriously... I'm a bit worried it isn't." He frowns, then starts bobbing his head back and forth once more.

links.title: Shivers: "The skin on your back is crawling...."
links.text: The skin on your back is crawling. For a second you can't even hear the music anymore.

links.title: Shivers: "There is a hawthorn tree on Rue de..."
links.text: There is a hawthorn tree on Rue de Saint-Ghislaine, right next to the canal.

links.title: Electrochemistry: "Don't be alarmed! Everything is oka..."
links.text: Don't be alarmed! Everything is okay. He isn't actually *worried*. Everything is still super hard core! What he probably means is -- it could be even more so!

links.title: You: ""I was thinking that too!""
links.text: "I was thinking that too!"

links.title: Egg Head: ""I am the mic enforcer, I am the ch..."
links.text: "I am the mic enforcer, I am the chicks checker, YEAGH!"

links.title: Inland Empire: "Feels like you should reply with th..."
links.text: Feels like you should reply with the very pinnacle of idiocy here, so that things get totally transcendent. But you haven't gotten there yet, so you don't know what to say.

links.title: You: ""I don't know what to say exactly...""
links.text: "I don't know what to say exactly..."

links.title: Egg Head: ""Under the radar, OVER THE TOP!""
links.text: "Under the radar, OVER THE TOP!"

links.title: You: ""I was just thinking that a moment..."
links.text: "I was just thinking that a moment ago!"

links.title: Egg Head: ""ONE MIND! ONE SPIRIT! THERE IS NO..."
links.text: "ONE MIND! ONE SPIRIT! THERE IS NO OTHER WORLD -- THERE IS NO OTHER LIFE!"

links.title: You: ""No, but seriously... I'm a little..."
links.text: "No, but seriously... I'm a little worried it isn't."

links.title: Egg Head: ""The question is, what is the quest..."
links.text: "The question is, what is the question?"

links.title: You: ""Just answer the question!""
links.text: "Just answer the question!"

links.title: Egg Head: ""But there was no question...""
links.text: "But there was no question..."

links.title: You: ""That would have been good, if I ha..."
links.text: "That would have been good, if I had asked you a question. But I didn't. Now it's just idiotic."

links.title: Egg Head: ""But there was a question...""
links.text: "But there was a question..."

links.title: You: ""Please tell me, what exactly are y..."
links.text: "Please tell me, what exactly are you doing?"

links.title: Egg Head: ""Gotta get the people going!""
links.text: "Gotta get the people going!"

links.title: You: ""I see.""
links.text: "I see."

links.title: Egg Head: ""Yeah, request! I want everybody as..."
links.text: "Yeah, request! I want everybody as close to the stage as possible!"

links.title: You: ""Why?""
links.text: "Why?"

links.title: Egg Head: ""I'm the party boy, it's my job!""
links.text: "I'm the party boy, it's my job!"

links.title: You: ""What is a party boy?""
links.text: "What is a party boy?"

links.title: Egg Head: ""HARD CORE PARTY 25/7 BEYOND THE WI..."
links.text: "HARD CORE PARTY 25/7 BEYOND THE WINTER'S ORBIT STYLE!"

links.title: Encyclopedia: "There is a place far away in Katla,..."
links.text: There is a place far away in Katla, beyond a certain latitude known as *winter's orbit*, where there are 25 hours in a day. It is a tremendously cold place, abandoned to drunks and failed rock stars. Full of eternite, depression and half finished ski flying hills. The Suru live there.

links.title: You: ""I think I'm also a party boy.""
links.text: "I think I'm also a party boy."

links.title: Egg Head: ""Two on a track, watch your back, w..."
links.text: "Two on a track, watch your back, watch out for the heart attack!"

links.title: You: ""I was wondering if you knew who ki..."
links.text: "I was wondering if you knew who killed the mercenary hanging behind the Whirling-in-Rags hostel?"

links.title: Egg Head: ""Good morning, yeah! One, two, thre..."
links.text: "Good morning, yeah! One, two, three! Yekokataa, the place to be!"

links.title: You: ""I am beginning to think this reall..."
links.text: "I am beginning to think this really doesn't have anything to do with the case."

links.title: Egg Head: ""It's the message so listen and you..."
links.text: "It's the message so listen and you will see. No illusion, the spirit is what you feel!"

links.title: You: ""Why is this *Yekokataa* the place..."
links.text: "Why is this *Yekokataa* the place to be? What does that mean?"

links.title: Egg Head: ""Yekokataa is a hard core place!""
links.text: "Yekokataa is a hard core place!"

links.title: Encyclopedia: "An intricate system of irrigation n..."
links.text: An intricate system of irrigation networks pockmarking the earth, intermittent seas of phosphorous mud, ripped tarpaulin fluttering in the wind... A pair of molten rubber boots also comes to mind. All in all -- a truly hard core place.

links.title: Encyclopedia: ""Yekokataa" is an abbreviation from..."
links.text: "Yekokataa" is an abbreviation from the Graadian term "Zone of Ecological Catastrophe," an agricultural megaproject in the extreme south east of the Graadian isola. It involved cutting-edge approaches to irrigation and a completely new type of fertilizer.

links.title: You: ""Alright!""
links.text: "Alright!"

links.title: Egg Head: ""HERE COMES THE NIGHT!""
links.text: "HERE COMES THE NIGHT!"

links.title: You: ""But is it? I mean, really?""
links.text: "But is it? I mean, really?"

links.title: Egg Head: ""YEAAGHH!""
links.text: "YEAAGHH!"

links.title: Drama: "This young man adds a capital *G* b..."
links.text: This young man adds a capital *G* before the *H* in his *YEAGHs* and *AAGHs*. This produces a guttural, *Gottwaldian* accent and makes him sound more animal, more *in it*.

links.title: Encyclopedia: "Or maybe it's not Gottwaldian, mayb..."
links.text: Or maybe it's not Gottwaldian, maybe it's *Oranjese* -- probably an homage to Oranje, where Arno van Eyck is from, judging by his name. Could you be listening to an Arno van Eyck creation *right now*?

links.title: You: ""So this is the famous van Eyck I'm..."
links.text: "So this is the famous van Eyck I'm hearing?"

links.title: Egg Head: ""You know about him..." He moves hi..."
links.text: "You know about him..." He moves his mouth, but sound doesn't come out. His eyes are the size of saucers. Looks like you've rendered him speechless.

links.title: Empathy: "He's overcome with some mysterious..."
links.text: He's overcome with some mysterious emotion. It's not merely adoration for what a Hard Cop you are either. It's more. Could it be *gratitude*?

links.title: Andre: ""You know van Eyck?""
links.text: "You know van Eyck?"

links.title: You: ""Yeah, I'm a major Eyck-head.""
links.text: "Yeah, I'm a major Eyck-head."

links.title: Andre: ""Wow!""
links.text: "Wow!"

links.title: Noid: "The skinny wraith looks at you with..."
links.text: The skinny wraith looks at you with some disbelief.

links.title: Egg Head: ""So am I! SO AM I!" He begins to sh..."
links.text: "So am I! SO AM I!" He begins to shake his head so everyone would understand.

links.title: Andre: ""Oh!" Andre almost falls over backw..."
links.text: "Oh!" Andre almost falls over backward from the realization. "Is *that* why they call you Egg Head, because..."

links.title: Egg Head: ""Eyck-Head to the mega! The K becam..."
links.text: "Eyck-Head to the mega! The K became the G! The boy became the man!"

links.title: You: ""Your friend Acele mentioned him.""
links.text: "Your friend Acele mentioned him."

links.title: Andre: ""Good, good.""
links.text: "Good, good."

links.title: Egg Head: ""THE ADVENT!""
links.text: "THE ADVENT!"

links.title: You: ""No, it was just a turn of phrase.""
links.text: "No, it was just a turn of phrase."

links.title: Andre: ""Oh. Well, it really is him. It's a..."
links.text: "Oh. Well, it really is him. It's an honest to god van Eyck beat. Well, actually a reworking of a Pepi Popikarnassos track, but let's not get too deep into that whole mess."

links.title: You: ""YeaaaaaaGH!""
links.text: "YeaaaaaaGH!"

links.title: Egg Head: ""The Y to the E to the A to the A t..."
links.text: "The Y to the E to the A to the A to the A to the A to the A to the G to the H to the exclamation mark..."

links.title: Egg Head: ""YeaaaaaGH!""
links.text: "YeaaaaaGH!"

links.title: Perception (Hearing): "He missed one 'A'!"
links.text: He missed one 'A'!

links.title: You: ""You missed an 'A' there. I yelled..."
links.text: "You missed an 'A' there. I yelled mine with six 'A'-s, so you have to yell it with six too."

links.title: Egg Head: ""I'm the hard rhymer, the track att..."
links.text: "I'm the hard rhymer, the track attacker, the mic enforcer, the *six* checker! I am the law!"

links.title: You: ""You missed an 'A' there, but that'..."
links.text: "You missed an 'A' there, but that's okay. I'm a pretty lenient cop."

links.title: Egg Head: ""It's nice to be important, but it'..."
links.text: "It's nice to be important, but it's more important to be nice!"

links.title: Encyclopedia: "Or maybe it's not Gottwaldian, mayb..."
links.text: Or maybe it's not Gottwaldian, maybe it's *Oranjese* -- probably an homage to Oranje, where Arno van Eyck is from, judging by his name. Could you be listening to an Arno van Eyck creation *right now*?

links.title: You: ""Yeaaaah!""
links.text: "Yeaaaah!"

links.title: Egg Head: ""Lakierski materialski!""
links.text: "Lakierski materialski!"

links.title: You: ""You can *yeah* and say random thin..."
links.text: "You can *yeah* and say random things all day long, but the track still doesn't sound all that *hard* to me."

links.title: Egg Head: ""Spinning out lyrics since the day..."
links.text: "Spinning out lyrics since the day I was born."

links.title: Egg Head: ""And the amount of lyrics I got is..."
links.text: "And the amount of lyrics I got is against the law!"

links.title: You: ""Is it?""
links.text: "Is it?"

links.title: Egg Head: ""IT'S HAAAAAAAAARD CORE!""
links.text: "IT'S HAAAAAAAAARD CORE!"

links.title: You: ""You're just gonna keep saying it's..."
links.text: "You're just gonna keep saying it's *hard core*, aren't you?"

links.title: Egg Head: ""Skibadee, skibadanger! I am the re..."
links.text: "Skibadee, skibadanger! I am the rearranger!"

links.title: Authority: "Your cop training did not prepare y..."
links.text: Your cop training did not prepare you for this. What to do?

links.title: Inland Empire: "Could there have been a *right* way..."
links.text: Could there have been a *right* way out of this garden of forking paths, you think?

links.title: You: ""I don't know what to say to that.""
links.text: "I don't know what to say to that."

dialogueTree.title: Egg Head: ""Back to the heavyweight jam!" says..."
dialogueTree.text: "Back to the heavyweight jam!" says the young man with the tape player and the large boiadeiro boots. Lung-shaped trees sprout on his silver belt buckle.

links.title: Egg Head: ""Hard core!""
links.text: "Hard core!"

dialogueTree.title: Egg Head: "The young man with the tape recorde..."
dialogueTree.text: The young man with the tape recorder acknowledges your return. When he looks at you, he squints as though you were the setting sun...

links.title: Egg Head: ""This is hard core.""
links.text: "This is hard core."

dialogueTree.title: Egg Head: "A young man with peroxide blond hai..."
dialogueTree.text: A young man with peroxide blond hair holds up a Harmon-Wowshi tape player, nodding along to the music. He looks at you with a knowing smile and says...

links.title: Inland Empire: "....as though you're supposed to be..."
links.text: ....as though you're supposed to be sharing some tremendous, evangelical secret...

links.title: Egg Head: ""Hard core.""
links.text: "Hard core."
